item.title: How to make certain items Owner only
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

if(playerHasItem2(####) && playerRights != 3) { deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), 1); }
Try that.

Read full topic
